021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.format.FormatRule;
025import net.tnemc.core.utils.Monetary;
026import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
027
028import java.math.BigInteger;
029import java.util.Optional;
030
031public class MinorNameRule implements FormatRule {
032
033  @Override
034  public String name() {
035
036    return "<minor.name>";
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  public String format(@Nullable final Account account, final HoldingsEntry entry, final String format) {
041
042    final Monetary monetary = entry.asMonetary();
043
044    /*
045    [15:52:47 WARN]: java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "java.lang.CharSequence.toString()" because "replacement" is null
046[15:52:47 WARN]:        at java.base/java.lang.String.replace(String.java:2956)
047[15:52:47 WARN]:        at BukkitCore-0.1.3.0-SNAPSHOT-13.jar//net.tnemc.core.currency.format.impl.MinorNameRule.lambda$format$0(MinorNameRule.java:42)
048[15:52:47 WARN]:        at java.base/java.util.Optional.map(Optional.java:260)
049[15:52:47 WARN]:        at BukkitCore-0.1.3.0-SNAPSHOT-13.jar//net.tnemc.core.currency.format.impl.MinorNameRule.format(MinorNameRule.java:42)
050[15:52:47 WARN]:        at BukkitCore-0.1.3.0-SNAPSHOT-13.jar//net.tnemc.core.currency.format.CurrencyFormatter.format(CurrencyFormatter.java:77)
051[15:52:47 WARN]:        at BukkitCore-0.1.3.0-SNAPSHOT-13.jar//net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSet(MoneyCommand.java:299)
052[15:52:47 WARN]:        at BukkitCore-0.1.3.0-SNAPSHOT-13.jar//net.tnemc.bukkit.command.MoneyCommand.onSet(MoneyCom
053     */
054
055
056    final Optional<Currency> currency = entry.currency();
057
058    return currency.map(value->format.replace("<minor.name>",
059                                              (monetary.minorAsInt().compareTo(BigInteger.ONE) == 0)?
060                                              value.getDisplayMinor() :
061                                              value.getDisplayMinorPlural())).orElse(format);
062  }
063}
